content.detailedDescription: I was just sitting in my bedroom just looking out across the sky at the sun coming up. i thought at first it was a bright star, but it was too bright for where it was sitting.  i waited to see if it moved from it's place and it did!! i measured the movement fron the stationary trees.  also it blanked twice.  from my viewpoint it moved in a circular patters a couple inches every ten monutes. . .Then it disapeared!!!  i believe it blinked just for me but who knows?  it just faded into the sky!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A starlike light that hoverev and twice blinked, moved small direction change and faded ten inches from my viewpoint

content.detailedDescription:
I am here at work i work graves so i see alot of things. this is the first time i have seen the lights here. the last time was.5.Months ago in antelope valley ca. but it followed myself and my friend while walking our horses. its strange.But they are pretty lights.When we would look at it . ot would move away. when we looked.Down
it was 10 times closer tgan before. so we got on my horses and rode home. the sighting lasted.About 35 minutes,
content.summary: Colors in the sky. flashing moving ect.

content.detailedDescription:
friday january 17 2014, fremont calif , residential area.
area air traffic: =  heavy> 
this area directly under incoming flight paths to surrounding airports.

semi-adjacent to a freeway and powerelines

weather condition = clear / calm no wind. 

time of day was evening / night @ approx  8:19 - 820pm.
sight time: = approx 8:19 - 8:20pm.

sight duration = approx 3/4 minutes.

object/area sound = 
object was silent / no air traffic/cars observed at that moment.

1st photo      file info time 821pm

2nd photo      file info time 822pm

placed call    file info time 822pm

details:
outside smoking cigarette , observed low flying moving light just above treeline or at streetlight level.

appeared same color as street light (orangeish-yellow), upon closer look , appeared to look like fire or static ball/orb shaped.

object veered to my left/it's right slightly as i quickly stepped down driveway to street level and approached it.

object stopped over the across the street house. as i began to start up camera on phone talking to myself aloudly.

as if it had some intelligence , it appeared to stop when i started to talk, almost like it heard or seen me.

object then started to move up and northward (at an ascending angle) as i aimed camera at it,  it appeared to be moving at the same speed as it was moving when i first sighted it almost in a leisure movement/pace.

i managed to get 2 photos before it was gone , i had called the friend of which i am staying at to tell him to come and see it  , but he arrived from the house too late.
to the eye the object was round as i stated or orb shaped, and appeared to look like static or flames within the shape.
afterwards , i still cant stop thinking about it, and have been 
trying to catch sight of another on film since, an overwhelming
feeling of anxiety or anxious to go look outside from the time i wake till
the time i sleep. i feel i am constantly sky watching.
the event plays over and over , i cant forget the sight of it.

photo 1 ((under the screen zoom & magnifying glass) appears to show,  
what appears to be 8 circles in a 332 square form or shape.

photo 2 (under the screen zoom & magnifying glass )shows an arrow or triangular formation made up of 6 circles and a square/diamond shape 
made up of 5 circles-, say,  behind it ? 
again , it was an orb or circle when i seen it with my eyes.

picture info from camera/phone:>  
picture 1 =  23kb / 640x480 resolution  
picture 2 = 34kb / 640x480 resolution.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed/photo'd orange ball at street light level approached it , it moved evassively as i walked towards it with phone/camera in hand

content.detailedDescription: My wife was looking at a property to purchase in oudtshoorn, south africa. when i returned home for my vacation i viewed the pictures and one had a flash type mark on it and on closer examination a solid looking craft can be seen in the picture. all other pictures of the outside of the house were clear. no one saw anything when the picture was taken nor heard any sound or experienced anything abnormal according to my wife.
content.summary: My wife photographed a house and the picture later showed a blur and object

content.detailedDescription: While deer hunting in mora,mn in the winter of 1981 when i was 15 years old i went outside to go the bathroom (we were staying in a travel trailor)and i looked up at the stars and there it was. i noticed a red light hovering in the sky swaying back and forth. it made no noise and i watched it just hover and glow for about 3 minutes or so, i was excited not knowing what it was and not knowing anything about ufo's at this time. i went in and got my dad and my uncle and we watched it for another 7 minutes or so and then i got the owners of the house, a couple, to come out and watch it for another 10 minutes or so.At the end it just took off going away from us at such a speed it was out of site in a matter of seconds.We just stared at where it went and talked about it and went back in the trailor. today, only my dad and i are still alive that witnessed it. he denies seeing anything now and i'm sure would like to remain anonymous. i never thought of reporting it till now, i want there to be a record of it.
content.summary: Red light hovers above mora 1981

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to view the new years eve goings on, i stepped out of my house at approx 12:03 am. there were fireworks and sky rockets as one might expect, i noticed a light that i thought was a helicopter that traveled from the nw towards the se from my vantage point. this light then stopped at about 11 o'clock from my position and hovered, a second object then appeared below the first and hovered below it. the first object then ascended higher and higher while the second object remained stationary. i walked to the front of my driveway and observed two more objects far out to the west and appearing star like and much smaller. through all of this i thought what i was seeing were either flares or chinese candles, keep in mind it was just after midnight on new years eve. i watched the objects for at least several minutes, i thought they appeared out of the ordinary but given the circumstance ( new years eve 12:03 am )i thought they were probably flares or chinese candles. i returned inside my house and after a while i went to bed. i was not drinking and let me state that clearly, i had no alcohol although it was new years eve. the next day there were news reports of these same objects ( by description of media reports )on the news. this got my curiosity right away. looking into it i found a video from the hollywood hills on the internet and it was exactly what i had witnessed. what really got me was the fact that i am at least 25 miles south of the hollywood hills. how do you see the same flares or chinese candle from a location separated by that distance in a major metropolitan area. the news reports described these objects ( eyewitness accounts ) exactly as what i had witnessed. these same objects were seen from canada to n.California ( shortly before i seen them ) and also in texas and n.Carolina. it was only then after seeing these reports the next day that i was convinced i had seen something completely out of the ordinary. they were a pinkish orange color and their movements were very odd ( not way out whacky but just how they seemed to glide )turns out a whole lot of people seen them in a whole lot of places. that's a true honest account and what i seen i have no idea what they were. i took a photo with my cell phone and it shows nothing.
content.summary: New years eve 12:03 am

content.detailedDescription:
1- we were sitting in the car waiting for hubby to come out of store.
2- i made the first notice sitting in the drivers seat.
3- wasnt sure maybe a drone.
4- red and green flashing lights on an object in the sky then made a    circular turn and then went high in the sky and just hoovering and then we left.
5- couldnt believe what i saw and still wondering what it was.
6- we didnt but we left to drive home and then went in backyard when we got home and couldnt see it.
content.summary: Sitting in car, saw red and green lights in sky looked like something flying, then it kinda flew and made a circle then it went up high into the air and just stayed hoovering, then we left.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside taking out the trash and saw a strange light in the sky. i had my phone on me so i called my wife who was in the house and told her to get outside. she was standing by the garage and i was walking back towards the house (about 90 feet). my neighbor was also outside. it appeared to be moving towards the ground, vertically towards the area where we live, then prior to it disappearing it moved back towards the sky. it was bright and disk shaped, no sounds were present. it stayed in one place for a few seconds and then would move erratically in a chaotic pattern, but with no recognizable signature to identify it by any means. it was not an aircraft, because immediately as this was happening we heard two jets (aircraft of jet-like origin) moving towards the object. we tried to video tape this with the camera phone but it was too dark, and would not be sufficient for what we saw. after we heard the jets coming towards the area of the object, it shot across the sky and disappeared. the jets continued to make loud noise, but soon after were gone as well.
content.summary: Bright disc spotted over east jacksonville near 295, with aircrafts following.

content.detailedDescription: This was not from our planet ,it seemed that it knew we seen it , then it flew off very very fast .
content.summary: This thing flew so fast from a hovering position then gone ,like it went in to space,

content.detailedDescription: Me and some friends just got done eating at a brewery when we looked in the sky and saw three blue lights in a triangle. one of the corner lights would occasionally turn white. it was moving around seemingly high and dropping behind buildings (we where near the city) it was very close to a passenger jet. too close to be another one. it was spinning and dropping and going very fast.
content.summary: 3 blue lights moving around fast

content.detailedDescription:
Saw this two nights in a row.  5lights above kinda like v shape two on each side one larder brighter white in center. the thing made no noise and just appeared to not move. you could see clouds behind it. the breeze was blowing and the palm tree swayed but it was silent no noise at all very weird because you always hearncrickets and  normal night sounds.   
i had taken trash out and  looked to the left and saw it. thought it strange but honestly thought it was a plane or something then watched it it did not move and it was quiet strange for our street as we have a canal and large empty lot next to us and always hear some noise from animal or insect.
content.summary: 5light  4smaller yellowish 1white

content.detailedDescription: Copper color ball under the moon and the blue ball was to the left a little lower in the sky
content.summary: Round balls, one blue and one copper

content.detailedDescription: I was on my computer in my room playing borderlands 2 with my friend, i like to look outside the window behind me a lot, its kind of a habit, and i mentioned something to him about seeing two big birds outside. i keep watching from my seat and then get up and walk like 8ft to the window once i noticed that they were flying oddly. i was really focused on the one object the whole time so i can't be sure if the other object was a bird or another ufo, but since it went out of view relatively quickly i'm gunna say it was a bird. the one thing was like nothing i would have imagined a ufo to be, it was 6 distinct discs connected together in the pattern of a hexagon so as to allow an open space in the middle, this space looked kind of hazy as did the air in immediate contact with the wobbling object. the arrangement of 6 discs moved as one big one, and i saw it from various angles as it really wobbled a lot as it moved from approximately 218 degrees south west (according to my iphone's compass)to 10 degrees north passing directly over my house, maybe they noticed me waving and trying to record it or it might just be a coincidence. unfortunately when i first pressed the record button it didn't register, i was kind of rushed as it was close to my house at this point (it was below the cloud cover and i first saw it from maybe around a dozen blocks away its hard to tell). i still got a real good look at it for about 25 seconds. the object didn't do a sharp turn but a gradual one as it hovered towards my direction and wobbled, and it was only until it was directly over the corner of my block did i really get under it and was sure of its unique shape. when it was more in the horizon it was seen from the side at first wobbling, so what i thought might be a large bird flying away from me and in a circle started looking like an odd row of 3 bumps to a circle of smaller circular objects hovering and wobbling, also spinning slowly. the wobble was like when you spin a spinning top and it's starting to lose momentum.
content.summary: An odd shape was seen out my window, flew over my house and got a good look at it. very weird shape, 6 black disks connected together to form a circle/disk that wobbled a lot. like putting 6 coins as a hexagon.

content.detailedDescription: Okay it was summer of 93 i'm in the trinity alps backcountry trails working on trail work. i'm also the farm boy so i had to have the camp fire lit at 5 in the morning everyday andthe one to put it out every night. well this night meet my boss my c1 my friend posing and another see one from 88 backcountry trail was there at the campfire. we was the only ones up left and we were having a conversation when jose said who who.As i look to my left above the troubles lake i could see the ufo movie night at least nine thousand miles an hour. as it moved back and forth electro behind it like star trek enterprise. and all white trail as the ufo cab moving around betrayal didn't leave. after about 10 seconds ufo wasn't a one particular pattern back and forth pattern and then it was gone. meanwhile the trail star trek trailer is all white and it still left in the sky like somebody had a white pin in marked it to the list the stars the blackness of the sky. 6 seconds later the beginning of the star trek entry of were started again to descend to work finished. it took that moment about 12 seconds to finish then the trailer is gone. i told my see one now tell me that wasn't your fault he didn't have nothing to say.The next morning were out working on the trail. as well working on the trail with the two men running up the hill from down the hill we're going up the mountain. i told my friend i work with jason looking at. we stop working to watch these guys run through the trail.My main objective was to see some kind of fixing me a army navy airforce marines. as a rent house dust they had white hat white t shirt white shorts black sunglasses black beltway to 50 caliber handgun black boots.When i seen their ex signia it was encrypted like i've never seen before i couldn't read the name and on top of that it was a fluorescent color that i could barely catch when they went past me and the color was on the hat in the shirt they had a fluorescent yellow on one side of fluorescent green on the other hand what i would like to know is who were they wearing white outfit in black uh 50 caliber handgun and uh clips. did jason what do you think they're doing up the hill he said what do you think look at us i said yep i'm sure you're right. well watches for hours because they didn't come down the hill till after 3 p.M. so they were up there for about 5 56 hours another thing i noticed was the week before we seen that incident there was a walk to the sleigh called rock lake and as we got about uh mount have to the lake we know something very bizarre about something else going on the trainees um so i don't know but it's a pretty big picture if i could give it to you somebody out there had the time to want to investigate this week to find out a lot of stuff.
content.summary: I think it was military. tell me who those guys are.

content.detailedDescription: Well.Well it started back in 93 96 i was in the humble bay uh the humboldt bay and i was really exhausted from labor ready saul i had my back pack n of my sleeping bag and everything in the by the pier um about 2 blocks for i gots my my site i had a headache and i couldn't wait to go to sleep because i didn't get paid i got off from work too late to get my check so i was really upset well i got to my my my sleeping bag andso i the sleeping bag and i proceeded to go to sleep as i wasas i begin to go to sleep something told me instantly to look out of my sleeping bag and i didn't pay no mind because i figured i figured i had a long day i was tired i was cranky because i have any weed marijuana so i was very kind of cranky look up the sleeping bag hurt again look out your sleeping bag lookout a sleeping bag lookout a sleeping bag in a cap on going to look up the sleeping bag look up sleeping in the back to cap on going out listen to myself what's going on at the same time the voice kept going faster and faster the f*** and i'll open up took of the my sleeping bag lookout and i look toward the west right by the ocean and i seen it and it was just your fool sphere what is the bean flat it was like um you know how they say the ufo's of them are like a disconnect go up and down everything know it was like a disc that was not on the list and i like i like a el okay like i ok and um it was contracting retracting have to orange tail behind it might have been baby doll 1500 feet above me if not 2000 uh but its late to the closer now but anyways as you got to me about 11 o'clock degree we're looking at slow down and then again to stop has it stopped in the state map edition for about 35 seconds or whatever you could see was contracting retracting contracting retracted so fast that does the ufo's orange it was in the heat around your folks orange soda so i was going so fast as or shoot all around it was beautiful but anyways then it started after the 35 seconds whatever you decide to go and in speed up and take off just went very gently all the way to the east so i could not see no more and i was my last your phone counter who's my my best ufo incounter.
content.summary: They talked to me befor they came.

content.detailedDescription: one week after 911, my husband and i went camping in the n.J pine barrens we were right next to the wading river camp grounds, there were many campers in the area, the morning of the 16th i got up and made my precious coffee, tastes so good on a cold september morning in the woods, anyway... i took a big sip and looked to the sky, there it was, a big orb on the edge of our ionosphere i think...It wobbled as if it was turning i had my binoculars with me, i always do, and i had plenty of time to pass them around to fellow campers, we went camping that weekend to get away from the big city and to star gaze, there had been no planes and only military jets once in a while.  was there any other reports for the week after 911 ? i would love to know, i have seen many strange things in the sky's from here to colo. and i was brought up with an open mind, my grandfather was a ufologist in the 40's , so there you go....Please let me know what you think, thank you
content.summary: Wobbleing orb way up high, day time, pine barrens n.J

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:05 my husband went outside to walk our dog & at about 8:10 he saw these 4 orange lights low in the sky, he called for me to come outside i saw these orange in color bright lights gliding in a straight line formation one after the other traveling east.  they were silent. they were low in the sky as an low airplane would be. my husband went back inside to get my cell phone, then my mother came outside at that point and we all just stood there in awe and amazement really. they were really bright, traveling one after the other, in small groups, and 3 of them disappeared as soon as an airplane was heading toward them, the airplane was traveling from south to north. i called wink newsroom at 8:21, i told who answered the phone,  there were orange lights in the sky to go quickly outside she would see them, the woman who answered the phone was terse in her response she said i was the only caller and that they were probably chinese lanterns. i told her these didnt look like chinese lanterns not at all. she hung up the phone while i was still talking.  i counted at least 15 lights from the time i came outside. i took 2 photos one came out orange with a light on it. my husband has a video on his phone, showing 2 traveling one after the other and one really good pic of a orange light. the other pics showed up a white light. after they stopped coming a military helicopter or it could of been a police helicopter, it wasn't muffled, it went over our house traveling east too.
content.summary: At 8:10pm my husband saw in the sky 4 orange lights in a straight line formation gliding one after the other.

content.detailedDescription:
Sister asked me to look at bright bright white/yellow/orange spot in sky to left of sunrise.  as we watched, it slowly turned into a bright cigar shaped beam of light clearly appearing out of nowhere, no trail.  it grew very slow making a lightning like streak.  it's direction abruptly changed "falling" towards earth.  after disappearing a mysterious chemtrail appeared that came from different direction yet joined up with trail left from object we witnessed.  

there was evidence of another.  a wide trail appeared that ran paralel to the object we saw falling.
content.summary: Bright dot of light that turned cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed watching the night sky through the skylights, then that thing flew by! it looked like some sort of a military aircraft but it had no lights, it looked like it was made of metal, copper, it wasn't emitting light but reflected it. flew in a straight line fast but not too fast so i was able to get some details. its surface was patterned, like those battle spaceships you see in movies. to me the craft seemed to be small, like it would carry a maximum of two individuals. i often see planes passing by at night, i hear them, i see their lights, but that thing i saw, i don't know what it was but that was weird!
content.summary: If that was a plane, i'm a purple monkey!

content.detailedDescription:
I went out side to smoke and while she was out on the front porch an object that looked similar to a bright transparent jelly fish object moved from around the west corner of our house about 5 ft off the ground moving at the pace of a slow jog as it passed in front of me. i could see right through it and it was like a jelly fish and the out side glowed light redish orange. it was no more than 12 feet away in the middle of our drive way between me and a small oak tree. as it passed it continued in an arch path and moved up towards the north-east corner of our house and back into the back yard were two of our large dogs were as it moved to the back both dogs went crazy in the back yard barking and carrying on for about 10 minutes. my wife said she was to scared to go back there and look. i told my husband about this incident on 23 january 2014 when he questioned me why i would not go outside alone to smoke.  i was pretty shaken up about the whole experience and thought i was going nuts.  i had no idea what it was but just prior to the sighting i had an uneasy feeling i was being watched. 

my son who lives across from us in our other house had a similar incident coming up the mountain about three weeks ago when a bright orb flew directly in front of his car at aprox.1-2am.  the route up the mountain is extremely dark and not a lot of people live on that road it is mostly ranch land.  i don't believe that these things can be easily explained because we live so far out in country in a small neighborhood atop a small mountain.  we have heard others in the lake eufaula area talk about strange things but always chalked it up to just stories until now.
content.summary: Wife standing on porch saw jelly fish type object pass 10-12 ft. in front at 5ft ele. of her and move around our house to back yard

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i was driving down the road my son said mom look at that
i looked up and it was as high as a street light did not move or make a
sound i drove under it very slow i looked no flag no numbers no screws
i told my son you look at this you will never see it again.
content.summary: Made no sound did not move

content.detailedDescription: Contact me
content.summary: Weird

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:15 p.M. i went outside to get the mail.  i looked in the sky over the house across the street and saw 4 lights appear.  at first i thought it might have been fireworks but the lights did not dim or drop.  instead, they drifted to the east and then more lights appeared.  i rushed back into the house to get my husband.  when he came out more lights appeared.  i went back into the house to get my cell phone hoping for photos.  we watched while more and more lights appeared.  i started to video tape because i thought the lights were going to stop coming at any minute.  i have about twelve minutes of video of the lights appearing and drifting over the house and disappearing to the east.  at one point i have 9 lights on the video.  
in the meantime, my husband called 911 to see if there were any reports of lights in the sky over the cape.  there were no reports.  we are now watching the news to see if anyone else reported lights in the sky.
this was a very unusual sighting.  we have never seen so many lights at one time.
the video is incredible.
content.summary: I exited my house to get the mail and saw 4 flashing lights above the house across the street.  soon more lights started appearing.  i observed at least 30 to 40 lights appear and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and noticed 3 yellow-orange orb-like lights above the furthest visible treeline, moving upwards and across the sky.  i thought at first they might be a few helicopters or military craft moving in formation.  then 4 more appeared behind those, in the same fashion as the first and moving in same direction.  more orbs kept appearing in groups of 2 to 5, each group following behind the previous group.  at one point there were a total of 10-15 objects in the sky at once.  i noticed the woman driving next to me was on her phone, slowing down and pointing at the objects.  i parked in my driveway and noticed the first orbs passed over my neighborhood and slowly got dimmer until they were no longer visible.  more orbs kept following this path in the same manner, dimming in the same spot as the previous ones.  i couldn't tell if they were dimming out or simply moving so quickly that they were soon too far to see.  my phone was dead but i was able to charge it at home and got a single orb on video with my i-phone.  it was the last one i saw, before it dimmed out and was no longer visible. i honestly thought there was going to be some kind of ufo invasion or something.  i have never seen anything like this before.  i had a sighting about 7 years ago but it was only a single orb.  however, the orb i saw 7 years ago and the ones i saw tonight were of the same color, size, and behaved very similarly.
content.summary: Noticed 3 orb lights above treeline in distance moving upward and across sky, then 4 more appeared behind those, then more until about 15 orbs were in sky, moving in same direction.

content.detailedDescription: First appeared in distance as 3 red lights, then appeared in front of car, about as high as the car roof and about 3 feet in front of car, the car had to stop in road while it hovered there for about 30 seconds to 1 minute, this happened next to an airport, the object was triangular in shape but the points were rounded, and the object was translucent, kind of transparent, and made no noise at all. the item was described to be huge in size. it then, drifted off to the side of the road towards the airport, then a light from the airport connected with the object and it is lights went out and the object disappeared. there was no other traffic on the road at the time. as soon as the object disappeared the cars gps said they needed to make a u turn. three people were in the car during this indecent.
content.summary: Stopped car on road

content.detailedDescription:
On 1/14/14 about 7:00 pm my wife and i went outside to have a cigarette on the beach and look at the stars. we noticed several star size lights randomly blinking all over the sky, at times there may be one and other times at least 10 of them. about 7:15 we both witnessed a sphere like white light suddenly appear about 30 degrees off the horizon and straight in front of us heading north, after maybe 10 seconds it went out. a couple minutes later another white light appeared, possibly the same one, and split into two separate lights, one kept going in the same direction the other turning east, after about 10 seconds they went out.  around 10 or so minutes later we saw a rectangular object, we could clearly see 4 square sections that resembled windows and the entire thing was glowing white and horizontal to the ocean, it lasted a little more than 10 seconds before it went out. we both described to each other how it looked just like windows in amazement. a few minutes later the rectangle object appeared again except it was vertical to the ocean and in within 10 seconds went out. just south of us a single white light appeared over the water that light up the cloud above it and cast a light on the water, after a few seconds it went out. we watched between 6 or 8 of these white lights appear and within seconds go out.Around 7:35 or so we observed a red pulsating object north of us and at a high altitude heading east over the ocean, it was to far away to tell its shape. after a couple minutes it just disappeared. at about 8:00 another red object flying the same path did the same thing.
while watching these lights we heard no noise of any type coming from them.
we have watched these and other types of lights on previous nights, usually between 7 and 8pm and every time we see the star like blinking objects all over the sky we see strange lights like we did on this night.
i've been in the military and in law enforcement and have been around a lot of different aircraft, flares and even seen chinese lanterns before and no way possible it could be any of these things.
i tried several times to take a photo of these lights but they would go out before i could focus my camera, or they would go out as soon as i turned my camera on. i will keep trying to get a photo of these lights.
content.summary: Strange lights over myrtle beach south carolina

content.detailedDescription: Flight to cancun, window seat on left of plane, directly adjacent to left wing, looking out window, approximately 30 - 45min prior to landing, roughly 10:45pm (local time); saw very bright orb in front of left wing about 1 metre from tip. at first i thought it was the brightest star i had ever seen, realized it couldn't possibly be a star as it was too close and far too bright with no defined perimeter. i couldn't take my eyes off of it, i wanted to tell my travel companion but i didn't want to look away to tell her. orb stayed in same position to aircraft for several seconds and suddenly descended straight down extremely fast leaving a tail of white light. after the orb has disappeared from sight i kept looking for it, i then looked around the plane to see if anyone else seemed sort of stunned and excited.  i turned to my friend, with an odd look on my face i suppose because she immediately asked me "what? what's going on?" i excitedly told her what i had just seen.
content.summary: Bright orb hovering infront of left wing of airplane, sudden descent, leaving trail

content.detailedDescription:
During the evening just before a large snowstorm hit detroit i witnessed this object from my upstairs  south window.
it appeared to hover over the houses .I managed to take one picture from my itouch looked down to check my picture  it was gone when i looked up the reflection of my hat can be seen in window
content.summary: Large round object with dark shadow on one side

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were outside about 8 pm, sat. august 10th siting at our patio table having a glass of wine. i was facing west, when i noticed out of the corner of my eye, an orange orb on the horizon far away.  i told my
son to look, he did. the sun had just gone done, you could see the sunset
and lower clouds.  the orbs, one by one, went from the horizon from my right. southerly, ascending up into the cloud. first one, then another, then another, then two at once.  once they went into the clouds, we could not see them again. we discounted them, but the more i though about it the more
i felt they were weird.  no flashing lights like airplanes.  we are in the
landing pattern for midway, so we see planes all the time.  these were not planes.
content.summary: From far saw orbs coming from lower elevation going up into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out  my bedroom window  toward the southeast while getting ready for bed. it was about 8:45 pm. there was no cloud cover, which is unusual for this area. i saw what i thought was an airplane because it was bright, and i kept seeing flashes of color, mostly red flashes. i waited to see which direction the aircraft was flying. i noticed that it was moving slightly but it didn't move continuously in any direction, with the end result being that it stayed in the same relative position. then i though it might me flying towards me, but it didn't get larger. 

i would take my eyes away to do other things, then looked back. i kept seeing flashes of color, and couldn't think of an explanation for those. at one pont i saw a small moving pont of light fly into, behind, or in front of this brighter light and i didn't see it reappear on the other side.

then i decided to look at it through binoculars, and to ask my husband to look at it also. it seemed strange enough that i should pursue it somehow. he looked at it with his eyes, then with one eye through a single eyepiece of some binoculars. i asked him if he thought it looked strange. he said, "yes, very." he described it as looking like a little christmas ball with colored lights flashing around it. it appeared to him like it was moving towards him. he gave me a better pair of binoculars and when i first looked through those,  i  was really surprised to see multiple colored lights in a clump, bight primary colors: white, red, green, and blue. i also saw black space in between the lights. the whole bundle of lights seemed to be moving slightly...Up, down, back and forth, and i saw trails from the colored lights. i watched this for several minutes.

i turned on my "sky watch" app, pointed my phone in the general direction of the light. the only thing that seemed to correspond, position-wise to what i was looking at was the star sirius. it was downward and to the left of the big dipper. but even if i was looking at sirius, a binary star, how could that explain the multiple colored lights that we saw? and if it was one of those new drones that are out there nowadays, it seems like it should have moved off at some point.  so i was stumped. i tried to photograph, then take a video of it but those didn't reveal the interesting details.  the light was still there an hour later when i got tired of looking at it and went to bed.
content.summary: Bright star-like, wavering light with occasional flash of colored light. viewed through binoculars, we saw separate bright lights (white, red, blue, and green) with a small amount of black space in between.
